column4: Is there a Linux Application that would allow me to see WHO is associated with my accesspoint?  And possibly their computer name and or ip address????
slart / rww: so its not exactly *my accesspoint :)
slart / rww: I used to have suse on a laptop back in the day 10.0, and I was at an airport and could see computernames/ip addresses and could just poke/prod around... Was fun.
I got it installed with add/remove :-)
